sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The UK's Prime Minister Rishi Sunak appeared upbeat as he announced he'd seal the deal to resolve post-Brexit trade issues over Northern Ireland.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: After weeks of negotiations today, we have made a decisive breakthrough.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The Windsor Framework delivers free-flowing trade within the whole United Kingdom.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: It protects Northern Ireland's place in our union, and it safeguards sovereignty for the people of Northern Ireland.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: But he's only over the first hurdle.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Now it's time to convince Northern Ireland's politicians, especially the Democratic Unionist Party.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_16
sentences.sentence: In broad terms, it is clear that significant progress has been secured across a number of areas, whilst also recognising that there remain key issues of concern.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_16
sentences.sentence: There can be no disguising the fact, for example, that in some sectors of our economy in Northern Ireland, EU law remains applicable in our part of the United Kingdom.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The DUP's support will be key to restoring power sharing in Northern Ireland.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: They've been boycotting the devolved government until its concerns over the Northern Ireland protocol are resolved.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Sinn Féin wants that to end.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: What I've said consistently throughout the whole of the Brexit debate is that the people here have been left in limbo, they've left with uncertainty.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: I'm hoping that today, because we're at the end of the negotiation, the deal is now done.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The protocol had aimed to ensure free movement of goods across the Irish land border by conducting checks between Northern Ireland and Great Britain instead.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: But under the treaty, Northern Ireland had to keep following some EU rules.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: If the new Windsor framework can get across the line, then sighs of relief will be added to the messages of approval from the White House, Dublin, London and Brussels.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Huge investments are going to be needed if the European Union is to achieve its renewable energy plans.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: That's the main message being shared among EU energy ministers at a two-day meeting in Stockholm that kicked off on Monday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: It was centred on shoring up energy supply and reforming the electricity market.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: After the first day of talks, ministers stressed the need for more fossil-free electricity and the importance of developing better infrastructure such as charging points.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_15
sentences.sentence: Many ministers highlighted the need to get more and cheap fossil-free electricity in place for industrial competitiveness. Regarding e-mobility, sustainable biofuels and electrofuels, we seem to agree that we need all solutions and let market mechanisms develop the most cost-efficient alternatives.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: Let me end by reminding everyone that we will need significant investment to go from ambition to reality.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: Our assessment before the Green Deal showed investment needs for the vehicles and infrastructure needed for low-carbon mobility to be around 130 billion euros per year.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, France is seeking an alliance to push nuclear power as clean energy.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: And discussions on electricity market reform continue, with ministers hoping to shield consumer energy bills from short-term price spikes.
